001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import java.util.List;
011
012@Dao
013public interface GameResultDao {
014// TODO: 2/27/2024 define persistence operations for the game result entity.
015
016  String RANKING_QUERY = "SELECT * "
017      + "FROM game_result "
018      + "WHERE length = :length "
019      + "ORDER BY guess_count ASC, duration ASC";
020  String RANKING_QUERY_FOR_RESULT = "SELECT * "
021      + "FROM game_result "
022      + "WHERE length = :length "
023      + "AND user_id = :userId "
024      + "ORDER BY guess_count ASC, duration ASC";
025  String TRUNCATION_QUERY = "DELETE FROM game_result";
026
027  @Insert
028  Single<Long> insert(GameResult gameResult);
029
030  @Query(RANKING_QUERY)
031  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getRankedResults(int length);
032
033  @Query(RANKING_QUERY_FOR_RESULT)
034  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getRankedResults(int length, long userId);
035
036  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY)
037  Completable truncateResults();
038
039  default Single<GameResult> insertAndUpdate(GameResult gameResult) {
040    return insert(gameResult)
041        .map((id) -> {
042          gameResult.setId(id);
043          return gameResult;
044        });
045  }
046}
047
048
